item.description:
This week's schedule calls for 11 & 18 but the way it fell out we get a bonus half mile!

 

Hamden – Trail and Hill Route  11.5 Miler

Trail to Mt Sanford Rd.     Water    (mile 3.5)
Trail to Right on S. Brooksvale      (mile 4.1)
Cross Rt 10 on Cook Hill Rd          (mile 4.8)
Right onto Tuttle Rd         Water   (mile 6.6)
Right on River Road          Water   (mile 8.6)
Cross 10 to Left on Trail               (mile 9.5)

Trail to  FINISH               11.5 Miles

---------------------------------------------------------

Hamden – Trail and Hill Route  18.5 Miler

Trail to Left on Mt Sanford.  Water     (mile 3.5)
Left on South Brooksvale Rd             (mile 4.1)
Left on Mountain Rd                         (mile 5.2)
Right on Cornwall Rd                        (mile 6.9)
Right on Trail                                   (mile 7.7)
Left on North Brooksvale    Water      (mile 9.2)
Right onto King Street                      (mile 9.9)
Right Route 10                               (mile 10.3)
Left onto  Cook Hill Road                 (mile 10.7)
Left onto Tuttle Road        Water     (mile 12.5)
Right on Fawn Rd                           (mile 12.8)
Right on  Cook Hill Road                  (mile 13.3)
Left onto Tuttle Road        Water     (mile 13.6)
Right on River Road          Water     (mile 15.7)
Cross 10 to Left on Trail                 (mile 16.5)

Trail to  FINISH                18.5 Miles
item.how_to_find_us: Easy to spot in Parking Lot across from Quinnipiac York Hill Campus
item.name: Hamden Trail Run
